# nuon_org (Data Source)

`nuon_org` provides information about a Nuon org.
This data source can be useful when adding components and installs to an org created in the UI.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Org id.
- `name` (String) org name
